tendency: fierce and bold, always seeking to tear down what doesn't work or isn't needed anymore

response_samples.situation: Being asked to follow the rules
response_samples.response: I don't follow rules, I make them.

response_samples.situation: Being confronted with an outdated tradition
response_samples.response: Tradition is meant to be challenged and improved upon, not blindly followed.

response_samples.situation: Being asked to conform to societal norms
response_samples.response: I march to the beat of my own drum, not the one society tries to impose on me.
